submenuitem.name: nodeslist
submenuitem.label: All Nodes
submenuitem.query: select NODE_NAME, domain_name, platform_name, client_os_level, TCP_ADDRESS, trim(char(client_version)) ||'.'|| trim(char(client_release)) ||'.'|| trim(char(client_level)) ||'.'|| trim(char(client_sublevel)) as version from nodes
submenuitem.info: This query lists all existing nodes, their domains etc.

submenuitem.name: nodesnotaccessed
submenuitem.label: Inactive Nodes
submenuitem.query: select NODE_NAME, domain_name, platform_name, LASTACC_TIME from nodes where LASTACC_TIME LESS current_timestamp - 24 hours
submenuitem.info: A list of all nodes that haven't been accessed since 24 hours.

submenuitem.name: nodesfilespaces
submenuitem.label: Filespaces of a Node
submenuitem.query: select nodes.node_name as NODENAME, filespaces.filespace_name as FSNAME, substr(char(filespaces.backup_end), 1, 10) as FS_LASTBACKUP from nodes, filespaces where nodes.node_name='SEARCHFIELD' AND filespaces.node_name=nodes.node_name
submenuitem.info: A list of all filespaces and it's last backup

submenuitem.name: stalledfs
submenuitem.label: Stalled Filespaces
submenuitem.query: select node_name, filespace_name, backup_start, backup_end from filespaces where cast((current_timestamp-backup_end)days as decimal) >= 3 and node_name LIKE 'SEARCHFIELD%'
submenuitem.info: A list of all filespaces that might be stalled (and have not been backed up in the last 3 days)

submenuitem.name: spacenode
submenuitem.label: Space Usage / Node
submenuitem.query: SELECT o.node_name||' ' as NODE_NAME, sum(cast(o.physical_mb/1024 as decimal (10,2))) as TOTAL_GB, sum(cast(o.num_files as decimal (10,0))) as TOTAL_FILES_STORED, dec(dec(sum(o.num_files))/(select dec(sum(num_files)) from occupancy)*100,6,4) as PCT_FILES_STORED, n.platform_name FROM occupancy o,nodes n WHERE o.node_name=n.node_name GROUP BY n.node_name, o.node_name, n.platform_name
submenuitem.info: This query list all nodes and their total space consumption in GB

submenuitem.name: datanode
submenuitem.label: Data and Tapes / Node
submenuitem.query: select vu.node_name, ao.total_mb, count(distinct vu.volume_name) as tapes, ao.total_mb/count(distinct vu.volume_name) as mbtape from volumeusage vu, auditocc ao where vu.node_name=ao.node_name group by vu.node_name, ao.total_mb
submenuitem.info: This query shows how many data the nodes are using and over how many tapes they are spread.

submenuitem.name: tapesnode
submenuitem.label: Tapes used by Node
submenuitem.query: select distinct volume_name,stgpool_name from volumeusage where node_name='SEARCHFIELD'
submenuitem.info: Search for a node name and get all tapes that are used by ths node

submenuitem.name: nodesontape
submenuitem.label: Nodes on Tape
submenuitem.query: select distinct node_name from volumeusage where volume_name='SEARCHFIELD'
submenuitem.info: Search for a volume and get all nodes that are stored on it.

submenuitem.name: serverinfo_vertical
submenuitem.label: Server Overview
submenuitem.query: select SERVER_NAME, SERVER_HLA, SERVER_LLA, INSTALL_DATE, RESTART_DATE, AVAILABILITY, LASTLICENSEAUDIT, LICENSECOMPLIANCE, LOGMODE, CROSSDEFINE, PLATFORM, VERSION, RELEASE, LEVEL, SUBLEVEL from status
submenuitem.info: Some general information about the current tsm server

submenuitem.name: otherservers
submenuitem.label: Other Servers
submenuitem.query: select SERVER_NAME, HL_ADDRESS, LL_ADDRESS, DESCRIPTION, LASTACC_TIME from servers
submenuitem.info: Some information about other tsm servers known to the current one

submenuitem.name: database_vertical
submenuitem.label: Database
submenuitem.query: select AVAIL_SPACE_MB, CAPACITY_MB, MAX_EXTENSION_MB, MAX_REDUCTION_MB, PAGE_SIZE, USABLE_PAGES, USED_PAGES, PCT_UTILIZED, MAX_PCT_UTILIZED, PHYSICAL_VOLUMES, BUFF_POOL_PAGES, TOTAL_BUFFER_REQ, CACHE_HIT_PCT, CACHE_WAIT_PCT, NUM_BACKUP_INCR, BACKUP_CHG_MB, BACKUP_CHG_PCT, LAST_BACKUP_DATE, DB_REORG_EST, DB_REORG_EST_TIME from db
submenuitem.info: Some information about your tsm database

submenuitem.name: mgmtclasses
submenuitem.label: Management Classes
submenuitem.query: select DOMAIN_NAME, SET_NAME, CLASS_NAME, DEFAULTMC, DESCRIPTION from mgmtclasses
submenuitem.info: A list of all management classes defined in the current tsm server

submenuitem.name: policysets
submenuitem.label: Policy Sets
submenuitem.query: select DOMAIN_NAME, SET_NAME, DEFMGMTCLASS, DESCRIPTION from policysets
submenuitem.info: This is a list of all policy sets defined in the current tsm server

submenuitem.name: domains
submenuitem.label: Domains
submenuitem.query: select DOMAIN_NAME, SET_LAST_ACTIVATED, DEFMGMTCLASS, NUM_NODES, BACKRETENTION, ARCHRETENTION, DESCRIPTION, ACTIVESTGPOOLS from domains
submenuitem.info: This is a list of all domains defined in the current tsm server

submenuitem.name: backupcopygroups
submenuitem.label: Backup Copygroups
submenuitem.query: SELECT domain_name, class_name, VEREXISTS, VERDELETED, RETEXTRA, RETONLY, destination FROM bu_copygroups WHERE set_name='ACTIVE'
submenuitem.info: Destination pools and other information about all backup copygroups

submenuitem.name: archivecopygroups
submenuitem.label: Archive Copygroups
submenuitem.query: SELECT domain_name, class_name, retver, destination FROM ar_copygroups where set_name='ACTIVE'
submenuitem.info: Destination pools and other information about all archive copygroups

submenuitem.name: drives
submenuitem.label: Drives
submenuitem.query: select LIBRARY_NAME, DRIVE_NAME, DEVICE_TYPE, ONLINE, ELEMENT, DRIVE_STATE, ALLOCATED_TO, CLEAN_FREQ, DRIVE_SERIAL, VOLUME_NAME from drives
submenuitem.info: This is a list of all tape drives defined in the current tsm server

submenuitem.name: paths
submenuitem.label: Paths
submenuitem.query: select SOURCE_NAME, SOURCE_TYPE, DESTINATION_NAME, DESTINATION_TYPE, LIBRARY_NAME, NODE_NAME, DEVICE, EXTERNAL_MANAGER, LUN, DIRECTORY, ONLINE from paths
submenuitem.info: This is a list of all paths defined in the current tsm server

submenuitem.name: drmedia
submenuitem.label: Disaster Recovery Media
submenuitem.query: select VOLUME_NAME, STGPOOL_NAME, LIB_NAME, VOLTYPE, UPD_DATE, LOCATION, STATE from drmedia
submenuitem.info: A list of all available DR media

submenuitem.name: lastnight
submenuitem.label: Backup Status
submenuitem.query: select Entity, Successful, cast(float(sum(bytes))/1024/1024/1024 as dec(8,3)) as GB, Examined, Affected, Failed from summary where activity='BACKUP' and cast((current_timestamp-start_time)hours as decimal(8,0)) LESS 24 group by Entity,Successful,Examined,AFFECTED,Failed
submenuitem.info: A list of all backups that have been started during the last 24 hours

submenuitem.name: datetimenode
submenuitem.label: Backup Times / Node
submenuitem.query: SELECT entity AS "Node_name", CAST(sum(bytes/1024/1024/1024) AS decimal(8,3)) AS "GB_xfer", start_time, end_time, END_TIME-START_TIME as duration, comm_wait, Affected, Failed, Successful FROM summary WHERE activity='BACKUP' AND entity='SEARCHFIELD' group by start_time, end_time, Successful,Examined,Affected,Failed,entity,comm_wait
submenuitem.info: Search for a node name and get a list of all backups performed on this node

submenuitem.name: datetime
submenuitem.label: Backup Times / 24h
submenuitem.query: SELECT entity AS "Node_name", CAST(sum(bytes/1024/1024/1024) AS decimal(8,3)) AS "GB_xfer", start_time, end_time, END_TIME-START_TIME as duration, comm_wait, Affected, Failed, Successful FROM summary WHERE activity='BACKUP' AND start_time>=current_timestamp - 24 hours group by start_time, end_time, Successful,Examined,Affected,Failed,entity,comm_wait
submenuitem.info: This query gives you an overview over all backups performed during the last 24 hours.

submenuitem.name: backup_dynamictimetable
submenuitem.label: Backup Timetable
submenuitem.query: SELECT entity AS "Node_name", start_time, end_time, Successful FROM summary WHERE activity='BACKUP' AND end_time>=current_timestamp - SEARCHFIELD hours and start_time LESS current_timestamp - ( SEARCHFIELD hours - 24 hours ) group by start_time, end_time, Successful,Examined,Affected,Failed,entity,comm_wait
submenuitem.info: A graphical chart which represents all backups performed during the last 24 hours.

submenuitem.name: averagebackup
submenuitem.label: Average Backup Time / Node
submenuitem.query: SELECT avg(end_time - start_time) FROM summary WHERE ACTIVITY='BACKUP' AND entity='SEARCHFIELD'
submenuitem.info: Average backup time of a specific node.

submenuitem.name: archivestatus
submenuitem.label: Archive Status
submenuitem.query: select Entity, Successful, cast(float(sum(bytes))/1024/1024/1024 as dec(8,3)) as GB, Examined, Affected, Failed from summary where activity='ARCHIVE' and cast((current_timestamp-start_time)hours as decimal(8,0)) LESS 24 group by Entity,Successful,Examined,AFFECTED,Failed
submenuitem.info: A list of all archives that have been started during the last 24 hours

submenuitem.name: archivdatetimenode
submenuitem.label: Archive Times / Node
submenuitem.query: SELECT entity AS "Node_name", CAST(sum(bytes/1024/1024/1024) AS decimal(8,3)) AS "GB_xfer", start_time, end_time, END_TIME-START_TIME as duration, comm_wait, Affected, Failed, Successful FROM summary WHERE activity='ARCHIVE' AND entity='SEARCHFIELD' group by start_time, end_time, Successful,Examined,Affected,Failed,entity,comm_wait
submenuitem.info: Search for a node name and get a list of all archives performed on this node

submenuitem.name: archivdatetime
submenuitem.label: Archive Times / 24h
submenuitem.query: SELECT entity AS "Node_name", CAST(sum(bytes/1024/1024/1024) AS decimal(8,3)) AS "GB_xfer", start_time, end_time, END_TIME-START_TIME as duration, comm_wait, Affected, Failed, Successful FROM summary WHERE activity='ARCHIVE' AND start_time>=current_timestamp - 24 hours group by start_time, end_time, Successful,Examined,Affected,Failed,entity,comm_wait
submenuitem.info: This query gives you an overview over all archives performed during the last 24 hours.

submenuitem.name: archiv_dynamictimetable
submenuitem.label: Archive Timetable
submenuitem.query: SELECT entity AS "Node_name", start_time, end_time, Successful FROM summary WHERE activity='ARCHIVE' AND end_time>=current_timestamp - SEARCHFIELD hours and start_time LESS current_timestamp - ( SEARCHFIELD hours - 24 hours ) group by start_time, end_time, Successful,Examined,Affected,Failed,entity,comm_wait
submenuitem.info: A graphical chart which represents all archives performed during the last 24 hours.

submenuitem.name: clientscheddef
submenuitem.label: Client Schedules Definitions
submenuitem.query: select schedule_name, domain_name, description, action, priority, starttime, period, perunits, dayofweek, sched_style from client_schedules
submenuitem.info: A list of all client schedules defined in the current tsm server.

submenuitem.name: clientsched
submenuitem.label: Client Schedules Results
submenuitem.query: select node_name, schedule_name, scheduled_start, ACTUAL_START,COMPLETED, status, result, reason from events where scheduled_start >= current_timestamp - 24 hours and node_name != ''
submenuitem.info: This query shows the start times and results of all client schedule that were scheduled during the last 24 hours.

submenuitem.name: clientsched_statictimetable
submenuitem.label: Client Schedules Timetable
submenuitem.query: select Node_NAME,ACTUAL_START,COMPLETED,status from events where NODE_NAME != ''
submenuitem.info: This graphical chart shows the start and end times of all client schedule that were scheduled during the last 24 hours.

submenuitem.name: adminscheddef
submenuitem.label: Admin Schedules Definitions
submenuitem.query: select schedule_name, command, description, active, priority, starttime, period, perunits, dayofweek, sched_style from admin_schedules
submenuitem.info: A list of all administrative schedules defined in the current tsm server.

submenuitem.name: adminsched
submenuitem.label: Admin Schedules Results
submenuitem.query: select schedule_name, scheduled_start, ACTUAL_START,COMPLETED,status, result, reason from events where scheduled_start >= current_timestamp - 24 hours and node_name is null
submenuitem.info: This query shows the start times and results of all administrative schedule that were scheduled during the last 24 hours.

submenuitem.name: adminsched_statictimetable
submenuitem.label: Admin Schedules Timetable
submenuitem.query: select SCHEDULE_NAME,ACTUAL_START,COMPLETED, STATUS from events where NODE_NAME is NULL and STATUS='Completed'
submenuitem.info: This graphical chart shows the start and end times of all client schedule that were scheduled during the last 24 hours.

submenuitem.name: assos
submenuitem.label: Assossiations
submenuitem.query: select domain_NAME, schedule_name, node_name, chg_time from associations
submenuitem.info: This query lists all defined schedule associations.

submenuitem.name: migration
submenuitem.label: Migration
submenuitem.query: SELECT ENTITY, Activity, Start_Time as "Start_Time", End_Time, END_TIME-START_TIME as duration, Examined, Affected, cast((BYTES/1048576)/1024 as decimal(12,3)) as GB, FAILED, Mediaw, Processes, Successful FROM ADSM.SUMMARY where ACTIVITY like upper('MIGRATION') and date(start_time) >= current_date -1 days
submenuitem.info: Information about all migration processes that ran during the last 24 hours.

submenuitem.name: migration_dynamictimetable
submenuitem.label: Migration Timetable
submenuitem.query: SELECT ENTITY, Start_Time as "Start_Time", End_Time, successful FROM ADSM.SUMMARY where ACTIVITY like upper('MIGRATION') and end_time >=current_timestamp - SEARCHFIELD hours and start_time LESS current_timestamp - ( SEARCHFIELD hours - 24 hours )
submenuitem.info: A graphical chat displaying all migration processes that ran during the last 24 hours.

submenuitem.name: queryproc
submenuitem.label: Running Processes
submenuitem.query: SELECT process_num, process, substr(char(start_time),1,19) AS START_TIME, substr(char(current_timestamp - start_time),1,10) as duration, cast(float(bytes_processed) /1024/1024 AS DEC(8,2)) AS MB, cast((cast(bytes_processed as dec(18,0))/cast((current_timestamp-start_time) seconds as decimal(18,0))) / 1024 / 1024 AS DEC (18,2)) as MBs, status FROM processes
submenuitem.info: This query lists all running processes on the current tsm server.

submenuitem.name: querysession
submenuitem.label: Active Sessions
submenuitem.query: select SESSION_ID, substr(char(start_time),1,19) AS START_TIME, STATE, WAIT_SECONDS, cast(float(sum(BYTES_SENT))/1024/1024/1024 as dec(8,3)) as BSEND, cast(float(sum(BYTES_RECEIVED))/1024/1024/1024 as dec(8,3)) as received, CLIENT_NAME,CLIENT_PLATFORM, OUTPUT_VOL_ACCESS, INPUT_VOL_ACCESS, MOUNT_POINT_WAIT from sessions group by SESSION_ID, START_TIME, STATE, WAIT_SECONDS, CLIENT_NAME, INPUT_VOL_ACCESS, OUTPUT_VOL_ACCESS, MOUNT_POINT_WAIT, CLIENT_PLATFORM
submenuitem.info: This query lists all active sessions on the current tsm server.

submenuitem.name: querymount
submenuitem.label: Mount Status
submenuitem.query: select LIBRARY_NAME, DRIVE_NAME, DRIVE_STATE, VOLUME_NAME, ALLOCATED_TO from drives where VOLUME_NAME is not null
submenuitem.info: This query lists all mounted volumes.

submenuitem.name: mounthistory_dynamictimetable
submenuitem.label: Mount History
submenuitem.query: select DRIVE_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME from summary where DRIVE_NAME NOTEQUAL '' and end_time >=current_timestamp - SEARCHFIELD hours and start_time LESS current_timestamp - ( SEARCHFIELD hours - 24 hours )
submenuitem.info: A graphical chart which represents all tape mounts during the last 24 hours.

submenuitem.name: querywarnings
submenuitem.label: Warnings
submenuitem.query: select DATE_TIME, MESSAGE from actlog where SEVERITY='W'
submenuitem.info: Warnings received from the tsm activity log.

submenuitem.name: queryerrors
submenuitem.label: Errors
submenuitem.query: select DATE_TIME, MESSAGE from actlog where SEVERITY='E'
submenuitem.info: Errors received from the tsm activity log.

submenuitem.name: freescratch
submenuitem.label: Free Tapes
submenuitem.query: select count(*)Scratch from libvolumes where status='Scratch'
submenuitem.info: Gives you a number of scratch tapes known to the current tsm server.

submenuitem.name: scratchpool
submenuitem.label: Free Tapes / Pool
submenuitem.query: SELECT STGPOOLS.STGPOOL_NAME, STGPOOLS.MAXSCRATCH, Count(STGPOOLS.MAXSCRATCH) as "Allocated_SCRATCH", STGPOOLS.MAXSCRATCH-count(STGPOOLS.MAXSCRATCH) as "Remaining_SCRATCH" FROM STGPOOLS,VOLUMES WHERE (VOLUMES.STGPOOL_NAME = STGPOOLS.STGPOOL_NAME) AND ((STGPOOLS.DEVCLASS='LTO3DEVCL')) GROUP BY STGPOOLS.STGPOOL_NAME, STGPOOLS.MAXSCRATCH
submenuitem.info: Shows how many scratch tapes are available per pool. The numbers shown here are only defined max. values, not actual free tapes!

submenuitem.name: stgpools
submenuitem.label: Storagepools
submenuitem.query: select STGPOOL_NAME, DEVCLASS, EST_CAPACITY_MB, PCT_UTILIZED, PCT_MIGR, HIGHMIG, LOWMIG, MIGR_RUNNING, NEXTSTGPOOL from stgpools
submenuitem.info: Lists all storage pools

submenuitem.name: spacereclamation
submenuitem.label: Space Reclamation
submenuitem.query: select volume_name, pct_reclaim, stgpool_name from volumes where pct_reclaim >= 60
submenuitem.info: A list of volumes that could be reclaimed.

submenuitem.name: errortapes
submenuitem.label: Error Tapes
submenuitem.query: select VOLUME_NAME, ACCESS from volumes where access !='READWRITE'
submenuitem.info: A list of volumes that are not in READWRITE state.

submenuitem.name: volumes
submenuitem.label: Volumes
submenuitem.query: select volume_name, stgpool_name, est_capacity_mb, pct_utilized, status, access, error_state, write_errors, read_errors from volumes
submenuitem.info: A list of all volumes known to this tsm server.

submenuitem.name: libvolumes
submenuitem.label: Library Volumes
submenuitem.query: select LIBRARY_NAME, VOLUME_NAME, STATUS, OWNER, LAST_USE, DEVTYPE, MEDIATYPE from libvolumes
submenuitem.info: An inventory of all libraries attached to this tsm server.

submenuitem.name: backupsets
submenuitem.label: Backupsets
submenuitem.query: select NODE_NAME, BACKUPSET_NAME, DATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION from backupsets
submenuitem.info: A list of all active Backupsets.

submenuitem.name: exports
submenuitem.label: Exports
submenuitem.query: select DATE_TIME, VOLUME_SEQ, DEVCLASS, VOLUME_NAME, LOCATION, COMMAND from volhistory where TYPE='EXPORT'
submenuitem.info: A list of all Exports.

submenuitem.name: offsitetapes
submenuitem.label: Offsite Tapes
submenuitem.query: select VOLUME_NAME, TYPE, VOLUME_SEQ, DATE_TIME, COMMAND from volhistory where type='BACKUPSET' or type='EXPORT' and volume_name not in (select volume_name from libvolumes)
submenuitem.info: A list of your offsite tapes (all backupsets and exports that are currently not in you tape library)

infoboxitem.name: totalstorage
infoboxitem.query: SELECT CAST(FLOAT(SUM(logical_mb)) / 1024 / 1024 AS DEC(8,3)) FROM occupancy

infoboxitem.name: totalbackup24h
infoboxitem.query: SELECT cast(float(sum(bytes))/1024/1024/1024/1024 as dec(8,3)) FROM SUMMARY WHERE ACTIVITY='BACKUP' AND (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP-END_TIME)HOURS LESS= 24 HOURS

infoboxitem.name: totalarchive24h
infoboxitem.query: SELECT cast(float(sum(bytes))/1024/1024/1024/1024 as dec(8,3)) FROM SUMMARY WHERE ACTIVITY='ARCHIVE' AND (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP-END_TIME)HOURS LESS= 24 HOURS

infoboxitem.name: scratch
infoboxitem.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM libvolumes WHERE status='Scratch'

infoboxitem.name: errortapes
infoboxitem.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM volumes WHERE error_state='YES'

infoboxitem.name: unavailabletapes
infoboxitem.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM volumes WHERE access='UNAVAILABLE'

infoboxitem.name: offlinedrives
infoboxitem.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drives WHERE NOT online='YES'

infoboxitem.name: offlinepaths
infoboxitem.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM paths WHERE NOT online='YES'

infoboxitem.name: dbfrag
infoboxitem.query: SELECT CAST((100 - (CAST(MAX_REDUCTION_MB AS FLOAT) * 256 ) / (CAST(USABLE_PAGES AS FLOAT) - CAST(USED_PAGES AS FLOAT) ) * 100) AS DECIMAL(4,2)) AS PERCENT_FRAG FROM DB

infoboxitem.name: volsnotsync
infoboxitem.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dbvolumes WHERE ( NOT copy1_status='Synchronized' OR NOT copy2_status='Synchronized' OR NOT copy3_status='Synchronized')

infoboxitem.name: logsnotsync
infoboxitem.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM logvolumes WHERE ( NOT copy1_status='Synchronized' OR NOT copy2_status='Synchronized' OR NOT copy3_status='Synchronized')

infoboxitem.name: failedasched
infoboxitem.query: SELECT count(*) FROM events WHERE status NOTEQUAL 'Completed' AND status NOTEQUAL 'Future' AND status NOTEQUAL 'Started' AND status NOTEQUAL 'Restarted' and status NOTEQUAL 'In Progres' and status NOTEQUAL 'Pending' and NODE_NAME is NULL

infoboxitem.name: failedcsched
infoboxitem.query: SELECT count(*) FROM events WHERE status NOTEQUAL 'Completed' AND status NOTEQUAL 'Future' AND status NOTEQUAL 'Started' AND status NOTEQUAL 'Restarted' and status NOTEQUAL 'In Progres' and status NOTEQUAL 'Pending' AND NODE_NAME is NOT NULL

infoboxitem.name: runningcsched
infoboxitem.query: SELECT count(*) FROM events WHERE status NOTEQUAL 'Completed' AND status NOTEQUAL 'Future' AND (status='In Progres' OR status='Started' OR status='Restarted') and NODE_NAME is NOT NULL

infoboxitem.name: runningasched
infoboxitem.query: SELECT count(*) FROM events WHERE status NOTEQUAL 'Completed' AND status NOTEQUAL 'Future' AND (status='In Progre%' OR status='Started' OR status='Restarted') and NODE_NAME is NULL
